TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit OracleDataReader extends System.Data.Common.DbDataReader
Public NotInheritable Class OracleDataReader Inherits DbDataReader
public ref class OracleDataReader sealed : System::Data::Common::DbDataReader

summary.span: 提供自資料來源讀取順向資料流的資料列的方法。

span.span: Provides a way of reading a forward-only stream of data rows from a data source.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Close() cil managed

summary.span: 關閉 物件。

span.span: Closes the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 多個可以開啟任何給定的時間。More than one can be open at any given time. > [!CAUTION] > 請勿呼叫`Close`或`Dispose`連接上`DataReader`，或在任何其他 managed 的物件`Finalize`類別的方法。Do not call `Close` or `Dispose` on a connection, a `DataReader`, or any other managed object in the `Finalize` method of your class. 在完成項中，您應該只需釋放類別直接擁有的 unmanaged 的資源。In a finalizer, you should only release unmanaged resources that your class owns directly. 如果類別未擁有任何 Unmanaged 資源，請不要在類別定義中包含 `Finalize` 方法。If your class does not own any unmanaged resources, do not include a `Finalize` method in your class definition. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[回收](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/index.md)。For more information, see [Garbage Collection](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/index.md).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property Depth As Integer
public: virtual property int Depth { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，表示目前資料列的巢狀深度。

span.span: Gets a value indicating the depth of nesting for the current row.

value.span: 目前資料列的巢狀深度。

span.span: The depth of nesting for the current row.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 最外層的資料表深度為零。The outermost table has a depth of zero.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property FieldCount As Integer
public: virtual property int FieldCount { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得目前資料列中的資料行數目。

span.span: Gets the number of columns in the current row.

value.span: 當未置於有效的資料錄集中時，則為 0，否則為目前資料錄中的資料行數目。

span.span: When not positioned in a valid record set, 0; otherwise the number of columns in the current record.
The default is -1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包含隱藏欄位。Includes hidden fields. 使用 以排除隱藏欄位。Use to exclude hidden fields. 不會傳回資料列，在查詢執行之後傳回 0。After executing a query that does not return rows, returns 0.

exception.span: 沒有對資料來源的目前連接。

span.span: There is no current connection to a data source.

MemberSignature.Value: public override long GetBytes (int i, long fieldOffset, byte[] buffer2, int bufferoffset, int length);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance int64 GetBytes(int32 i, int64 fieldOffset, unsigned int8[] buffer2, int32 bufferoffset, int32 length) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetBytes (i As Integer, fieldOffset As Long, buffer2 As Byte(), bufferoffset As Integer, length As Integer) As Long
public: override long GetBytes(int i, long fieldOffset, cli::array <System::Byte> ^ buffer2, int bufferoffset, int length);
override this.GetBytes : int * int64 * byte[] * int * int -> int64

param.name: i
param.span: 以零為基底的資料行序數。

span.span: The zero-based column ordinal.

param.name: fieldOffset
param.span: 欄位中讀取作業開始之處的索引。

span.span: The index within the field where the read operation is to begin.

param.name: buffer2
param.span: 要將位元組資料流讀取到其中的緩衝區。

span.span: The buffer into which to read the stream of bytes.

param.name: bufferoffset
param.span: buffer 將要開始寫入作業的索引位置。

span.span: The index where buffer is to begin the write operation.

param.name: length
param.span: 要讀取的位元組數。

span.span: The number of bytes to read.

summary.span: 從指定的緩衝區位移開始，將來自指定資料行位移的位元組資料流讀取到緩衝區以做為陣列。

span.span: Reads a stream of bytes from the specified column offset into the buffer as an array, starting at the given buffer offset.

returns.span: 讀取的實際位元組數目。

span.span: The actual number of bytes read.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在欄位中傳回可用位元組的數。 returns the number of available bytes in the field. 在大部分情況下，這是欄位的確切的長度。In most cases this is the exact length of the field. 不過，傳回的數字可能小於欄位的實際長度如果`GetBytes`已經使用來取得位元組的欄位。However, the number returned may be less than the true length of the field if `GetBytes` has already been used to obtain bytes from the field. 這種情況下，比方說，如果可能讀入緩衝區的大型資料結構。This may be the case, for example, if the is reading a large data structure into a buffer. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱`SequentialAccess`設定。For more information, see the `SequentialAccess` setting of . 如果您傳遞 null 值的緩衝區傳回欄位的長度，以位元組為單位。If you pass a buffer that is a null value, returns the length of the field in bytes.

override this.GetChars : int * int64 * char[] * int * int -> int64

param.name: i
param.span: 以零為基底的資料行序數。

span.span: The zero-based column ordinal.

param.name: fieldOffset
param.span: 資料列中讀取作業開始之處的索引。

span.span: The index within the row where the read operation is to begin.

param.name: buffer2
param.span: 要複製資料的目的緩衝區。

span.span: The buffer into which to copy data.

param.name: bufferoffset
param.span: buffer 將要開始寫入作業的索引位置。

span.span: The index where buffer is to begin the write operation.

param.name: length
param.span: 要讀取的字元數。

span.span: The number of characters to read.

summary.span: 從指定的緩衝區位移開始，將來自指定資料行位移的字元資料流讀取到緩衝區以做為陣列。

span.span: Reads a stream of characters from the specified column offset into the buffer as an array, starting at the given buffer offset.

returns.span: 讀取的實際字元數目。

span.span: The actual number of characters read.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在欄位中傳回可用字元的數。 returns the number of available characters in the field. 在大部分情況下，這是欄位的確切的長度。In most cases this is the exact length of the field. 不過，傳回的數字可能小於欄位的實際長度如果`GetChars`已經使用從欄位取得字元。However, the number returned may be less than the true length of the field if `GetChars` has already been used to obtain characters from the field. 這種情況下，比方說，如果可能讀入緩衝區的大型資料結構。This may be the case, for example, if the is reading a large data structure into a buffer. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱`SequentialAccess`設定。For more information, see the `SequentialAccess` setting of . 如果您傳遞 null 值的緩衝區。If you pass a buffer that is a null value. 傳回欄位的長度，以字元為單位。 returns the length of the field in characters.

Public Overrides Function GetEnumerator () As IEnumerator

summary.span: 傳回 ，可用來逐一查看資料讀取器中的資料列。

span.span: Returns an that can be used to iterate through the rows in the data reader.

returns.span: ，可用來逐一查看資料讀取器中的資料列。

span.span: An that can be used to iterate through the rows in the data reader.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 雖然您可以使用這個方法來擷取明確的列舉值，支援 foreach 的語言建構，更容易使用迴圈建構直接以逐一查看資料讀取器中的資料列。Although you can use this method to retrieve an explicit enumerator, in languages that support a foreach construct, it's simpler to use the looping construct directly in order to iterate through the rows in the data reader.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 對於大部分的應用程式，方法提供有效率的方式擷取所有資料行，而不是個別擷取每個資料行。For most applications, the method provides an efficient means for retrieving all columns, rather than retrieving each column individually. 您可以傳遞陣列包含少於一個產生的資料列中所包含的資料行數目。You can pass an array that contains fewer than the number of columns contained in the resulting row. 資料量陣列，含有複製到陣列。Only the amount of data the array holds is copied to the array. 您也可以傳遞陣列，其長度都是多個資料行包含在產生的資料列數目。You can also pass an array whose length is more than the number of columns contained in the resulting row. 對於 null 資料庫資料行來說，這個方法會傳回 。This method returns for null database columns.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Data.DataTable GetSchemaTable() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetSchemaTable () As DataTable

summary.span: 傳回 ，描述 OracleDataReader 的資料行中繼資料 (Metadata)。

span.span: Returns a that describes the column metadata of the OracleDataReader.

returns.span: 描述資料行中繼資料的 。

span.span: A that describes the column metadata.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會傳回有關每個資料行的中繼資料以下列順序：The method returns metadata about each column in the following order: |DataReader 資料行DataReader Column|描述Description| |-----------------------|-----------------| |ColumnNameColumnName|資料行; 的名稱這可能不是唯一的。The name of the column; this might not be unique. 如果無法判別資料行名稱，則會傳回 null 值。If the column name cannot be determined, a null value is returned. 這個名稱一律會反映目前的檢視或命令文字中的資料行的最新命名。This name always reflects the most recent naming of the column in the current view or command text.| |ColumnOrdinalColumnOrdinal|資料行以零為起始的序數。The zero-based ordinal of the column. 此資料行不能包含 null 值。This column cannot contain a null value.| |ColumnSizeColumnSize|資料行中值的最大可能長度。The maximum possible length of a value in the column. 使用固定長度的資料類型的資料行，這是資料類型的大小。For columns that use a fixed-length data type, this is the size of the data type.| |NumericPrecisionNumericPrecision|如果是數值資料類型，這是資料行的最大有效位數。If is a numeric data type, this is the maximum precision of the column. 精確度取決於資料行的定義。The precision depends on the definition of the column. `Float` 和`Double`Oracle 中的資料類型是二進位精確度。`Float` and `Double` data types in Oracle are binary precision.| |NumericScaleNumericScale|如果是數值資料類型，在小數點右邊位數的數目。If is a numeric data type, the number of digits to the right of the decimal point. `Float` 和`Double`在 Oracle 中的資料類型為二進位的小數位數。`Float` and `Double` data types in Oracle are binary scale.| |DataTypeDataType|對應至 common language runtime 類型的。Maps to the common language runtime type of .| |IsLongIsLong|`true` 如果資料行包含二進位長物件 (BLOB)，包含很長的資料。`true` if the column contains a Binary Long Object (BLOB) that contains very long data.| |AllowDBNullAllowDBNull|`true` 如果取用者可以將資料行設定為 null 的值;否則， `false`。`true` if the consumer can set the column to a null value; otherwise, `false`. 資料行可以包含 null 值，即使它不能設為 null 的值。A column may contain null values, even if it cannot be set to a null value.| |IsUniqueIsUnique|`true`： 沒有基底資料表的資料表中傳回的兩個資料列-可以有相同的值，這個資料行中。`true`: No two rows in the base table-the table returned in -can have the same value in this column. **IsUnique**保證能夠`true`如果資料行本身構成索引鍵或類型只適用於此資料行的 UNIQUE 條件約束。**IsUnique** is guaranteed to be `true` if the column constitutes a key by itself or if there is a constraint of type UNIQUE that applies only to this column. `false`: 資料行可以包含基底資料表中重複的值。`false`: The column can contain duplicate values in the base table. 此資料行的預設值為 false。The default for this column is false.| |IsKeyIsKey|`true`： 資料行是一組資料列集中的資料行的其中一個，結合在一起唯一識別資料列。`true`: The column is one of a set of columns in the rowset that, taken together, uniquely identify the row. 與資料行集中**IsKey**設為 true，必須唯一識別資料列集中的資料列。The set of columns with **IsKey** set to true must uniquely identify a row in the rowset. 沒有這個資料行集是資料行的最小集合的需求。There is no requirement that this set of columns is a minimal set of columns. 這個資料行集可能會產生來自基底資料表主索引鍵、 唯一條件約束或唯一索引鍵。This set of columns may be generated from a base table primary key, a unique constraint or a unique index. `false`： 資料行不是需要唯一識別資料列。`false`: The column is not required to uniquely identify the row.| |BaseTableNameBaseTableName|資料表或檢視中包含資料行的資料存放區的名稱。The name of the table or view in the data store that contains the column. 如果無法判斷基底資料表名稱，則為 null 值。A null value if the base table name cannot be determined. 此資料行的預設值為 null 的值。The default of this column is a null value.| |BaseColumnNameBaseColumnName|在資料存放區中的資料行名稱。The name of the column in the data store. 這可能是在傳回的資料行名稱與不同**ColumnName**如果原先使用別名資料行。This might be different than the column name returned in the **ColumnName** column if an alias was used. 如果無法判斷基底的資料行名稱，或如果資料列集資料行衍生而來但不是完全相同，資料中的資料行存放區，則為 null 值。A null value if the base column name cannot be determined or if the rowset column is derived, but not identical to, a column in the data store. 此資料行的預設值是 null 值。The default for this column is a null value.| |BaseSchemaNameBaseSchemaName|包含資料行的資料存放區中的結構描述名稱。The name of the schema in the data store that contains the column. 如果無法判斷基底結構描述名稱，則為 null 值。A null value if the base schema name cannot be determined. 此資料行的預設值是 null 值。The default for this column is a null value.| 在結果集中的每個資料行都會傳回一個資料列。A row is returned for every column in the results set. > [!NOTE] > 為了確保中繼資料行傳回正確的資訊，您必須呼叫與`behavior`參數設定為`KeyInfo`。To ensure that metadata columns return the correct information, you must call with the `behavior` parameter set to `KeyInfo`. 否則，有些結構描述資料表中的資料行可能會傳回預設值，null 或不正確的資料。Otherwise, some of the columns in the schema table may return default, null, or incorrect data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 對於 null 資料庫資料行來說，這個方法會傳回 。This method returns for null database columns. 這個方法所傳回的值可能來自 Oracle 的數字資料類型轉換成.NET 十進位類型的結果。The value returned by this method might be the result of the conversion from Oracle's Number data type to .NET Decimal type. 如果太大，無法儲存在.NET 十進位值，這個方法會擲回也就是溢位例外狀況。If the value is too large to be stored in the .NET Decimal, this method throws an that is an overflow exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設位置第一筆記錄早。The default position of the is prior to the first record. 因此，您必須呼叫開始存取任何資料。Therefore, you must call to begin accessing any data. 多個可以開啟任何給定的時間。More than one can be open at any given time. ## Examples 下列範例會建立、 ，和。The following example creates an , an , and an . 此範例會讀取整個資料，並將它寫出至主控台。The example reads through the data, writing it out to the console. 最後，範例會關閉，然後在。Finally, the example closes the , then the . summary.span: 取得因執行 SQL 陳述式所變更、插入或刪除的資料列數目。

span.span: Gets the number of rows changed, inserted, or deleted by execution of the SQL statement.

value.span: 已變更、插入或刪除的資料列數。

span.span: The number of rows changed, inserted, or deleted.

value.span: SELECT 陳述式的值為 -1，如果沒有任何資料列受到影響，或是陳述式失敗，則為 0。

span.span: -1 for SELECT statements; 0 if no rows were affected, or the statement failed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 直到讀取所有資料列，而且您關閉屬性未設定。The property is not set until all rows are read and you close the . 和屬性之後，您可以呼叫已關閉。 and are the only properties that you can call after the is closed.
